title: ISic003323. Epitaph for [---]ius Innocens
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---]..[.]....ENTI
2[---]V[---]
3[---]T·NIANISHU[---]OBITOEX
4[................].AH[..............].ATASUNT
5E[---]L·EORSTATUA.
6·[---.............]SEIUSPE.MISSUMEST
7[---]·IAMCASMATSP

l.4 ic

Apparatus criticus

  • Text according to IMusMessina V and PHI313633

English translation

To [...]ius Innocens. [...] dies from the will of him (that his) bones are in a vaulted room (?) [...] their statues [...] and a seated statue of him has been allowed [...] mother at her own expense.

Italian translation

Per [...]ius Innocens. [...] muore dal testamento di lui (che le sue) ossa siano in una stanza ad arco (?) [...] le sue statue [...] e una statua seduta di lui è stata concessa [...] madre a sue spesse.

commentary

bibliography

  • V https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000029
  • Orsi 1916 144-145 fig.18 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001701
